Class FractalIFS

                          yafgen.FractalIFS
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class FractalIFS
extends FractalIterationFunction

The class FractalIFS implements an Iterated Function System, based on the defined matrix. The only implemented method is doIteration().

See Also:
